fields.title: The Last Thing He Told Me
fields.author: Laura Dave
fields.short_description: This book is a gripping and emotional thriller about a wife who embarks on a dangerous journey to uncover the truth behind her husband's disappearance.

fields.title: Klara and the Sun
fields.author: Kazuo Ishiguro
fields.short_description: In this book an Artificial Friend named Klara forms a special bond with a teenage girl while exploring the intricacies of human emotions and the world around her.

fields.title: The Alchemist
fields.author: Paulo Coelho
fields.short_description: A shepherd boy follows his dreams, learning the language of the universe and discovering his true destiny.

fields.title: Mexican Gothic
fields.author: Silvia Moreno-Garcia
fields.short_description: A young woman travels to a creepy, isolated house in the Mexican countryside to save her cousin from a dark fate.

fields.title: The Southern Book Club's Guide to Slaying Vampires
fields.author: Grady Hendrix
fields.short_description: A book club of Southern housewives takes on a charming but sinister stranger who may be a vampire.

fields.title: The Vanishing Half
fields.author: Brit Bennett
fields.short_description: Twin sisters grow up in a black community in the 1950s, but as adults, one passes as white while the other lives as a black woman.
